data.description: issuanceFixed is used to create new tokens with fixed supply.

parameters.name: from_address
parameters.help: The address to send from. This address must be belong to wallet (ismine = true) and has enough bitcoin to pay miner fee.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: the name of the new tokens to create

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.help: the ecosystem to create the tokens in (1 for main ecosystem, 2 for test ecosystem)

parameters.name: divisible_type
parameters.help: the type of the tokens to create: (1 for indivisible tokens, 2 for divisible tokens)

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: a description for the new tokens (can be '')

parameters.name: amount
parameters.help: the number of tokens to create

data.description: issuanceManaged is used to create new tokens with manageable supply. NOTE: Record the txid returned by OBD and get the property id you have issued manageable asset with GetTransaction (type 1206) API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: the name of the new tokens to create

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.help: the ecosystem to create the tokens in (1 for main ecosystem, 2 for test ecosystem)

parameters.name: divisible_type
parameters.help: the type of the tokens to create: (1 for indivisible tokens, 2 for divisible tokens)

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: a description for the new tokens (can be '')

data.description: sendGrant is used to issue or grant new units of managed tokens.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.help: The identifier of the tokens to grant. Get it by invoke GetTransaction (type 1206) API through input the txid returned by issuanceManaged (type 1202) API.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.help: the amount of tokens to create

parameters.name: memo
parameters.help: a text note attached to this transaction (none by default)

data.description: sendRevoke is used to revoke units of managed tokens.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.help: The identifier of the tokens to revoke. Get it by invoke GetTransaction (type 1206) API through input the txid returned by issuanceManaged (type 1202) API.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.help: the amount of tokens to revoke

parameters.name: memo
parameters.help: a text note attached to this transaction (none by default)
